hadiths.text: Ibn 'Abbas reported:When there was a solar eclipse the Messenger of Allah (way peace be upon him) observed eight ruku's and four prostrations (in two rak'ahs). This has been narrated by 'Ali also

chapter.ara-name: باب ذِكْرِ مَنْ قَالَ إِنَّهُ رَكَعَ ثَمَانَ رَكَعَاتٍ فِي أَرْبَعِ سَجَدَاتٍ
chapter.eng-name: Those Who Say That He Prayed With Eight Bowings And Four Prostrations
